alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Davidson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 3:47PM CDT until April 05 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Davidson County in Middle Tennessee... Central Cheatham County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 347 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pegram, or 7 miles south of Ashland City, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ashland City, Nashville, Kingston Springs, Pegram, Joelton, Beaman Park, Bells Bend and Whites Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 187 and 194, and between mile markers 198 and 211. Interstate 65 between mile markers 85 and 88. Interstate 24 between mile markers 38 and 49. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
